sentences.en: A major whose aesthetic sense exceeded his judgement decided to have the canisters painted white.
sentences.cn: 有一位少校由于审美的观念使他失去了判断力,他决定要把这些罐子漆成白色.

sentences.en: a work of great aesthetic appeal
an aesthetic appreciation of the landscape
sentences.cn: 用审美的眼光欣赏风景

sentences.en: And it has greater aesthetic value.
sentences.cn: 而且这幅画颇具审美价值.

sentences.en: From an aesthetic point of view it's a thetic view.
sentences.cn: 从美学观点来说,这是个武断的看法.

sentences.en: From an esthetic point of view, it’s a nice design.
sentences.cn: 从美学角度看，这是个不错的设计。

sentences.en: He is given to viewing life as if it were an aesthetic spectacle.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢观察生活,好象生活是一幅美的图景.

sentences.en: He responded very strongly to the aesthetic of this particular work.
sentences.cn: 他强烈地感受到这件作品的美学价值。

sentences.en: Later, as time permitted and aesthetic considerations prevailed, more attractive rail fences were put up.
sentences.cn: 后来人们有了闲暇及审美的考虑, 美观的篱笆就被建造出来了.

sentences.en: My aesthetic standards are quite different from his.
sentences.cn: 我的审美标准与他的大不相同.

sentences.en: She is aesthetic and she is interested in the theories of aesthetics.
sentences.cn: aesthetic:她是个具有审美感的人,她对美学中的理论很感兴趣.

sentences.en: Sun's novels made outstanding achievements in expressive art and individual aesthetic style.
sentences.cn: 孙犁在小说的抒情艺术和个人美学风格的独创上,取得了突出的成就.

sentences.en: That armchair is comfortable but not very aesthetic.
sentences.cn: 那张扶手椅坐起来舒服,但不太美观.

sentences.en: The pale green dome making the aesthetic protest in the solitude of sky.
sentences.cn: 淡绿色的圆顶在寂寞的天空中孤芳自赏.

sentences.en: The professor advanced a new aesthetic theory.
sentences.cn: 那位教授提出了新的美学理论.

sentences.en: The static, aesthetic searchings of the Cubists were quite alien to them.
sentences.cn: 立体派的静止的 、 美学的探求是同他们格格不入的.

sentences.en: Their furniture was more aesthetic than functional.
sentences.cn: 他们的家具美观多于实用。

words.tran_cn: 审美的；美学的；有审美感的

phrases.tran_cn: 美感，审美观念；审美知觉

trans.tran_en: connected with beauty and the study of beauty
connected with beauty and the study of beauty
